content.rendered:
Not all superheroes are good. They are not nice. They don’t want to help. The most depraved are gathered into the mysterious X-detachment and thoroughly armed. Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a few other sophisticatedly evil residents of Belle Reve prison plant small explosives in their heads: if they disobey, the bomb will explode. If they obey, they can save the world.

Director: James Gunn

Writer: James Gunn

Stars: Margot Robbie. Idris Elba. John Cena
